entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@atiku @nmanigeria Mark this day Atiku! This your moronic juvenile tweet is coming back to haunt you. You are too old to be this irresponsible.
So Nig. Govt. shall provide PPE to Dr  Emeka; a private practitioner who attempted to manage COVID-19 patient in his private hospital out of greed.  SHAME!
